articles.title: Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Russia
articles.content:
Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Russia 
    Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in booklet by the "Pravda-Press" Publishing House in Russia.
 This work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), serves as a great immortal programme for the party construction and activities as it reviewed with pride the glorious history of the WPK in which it paved a new road for building a revolutionary party in the era of independence and indicated a way of strengthening and developing the WPK to be an eternal party of President Kim Il Sung.
